articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex seething with the drive for effecting a new revolutionary surge.
					  Accompanying him were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi, department director of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 The first leg of his guidance was the February 8 Vinalon Complex.
					
					 After being briefed on the complex before a map showing the production processes at the workshops expected to start full-scale production before long, he went round a plasticizer shop and other several places to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production at the complex.
					
					 After seeing the technologically updated production processes, Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the successes made by the officials, workers and technicians of the complex, expressing great satisfaction at the fact that they contrived, manufactured and installed dozens of equipment by their own efforts and with their own technology and, at the same time, completed a lot of construction objects. The workers of the complex have changed its appearance as required by the new century under so difficult conditions by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance in response to the slogan "When the Party is determined we can do anything!", making it possible to give fuller play to the might of the Juche-based industry, he said, adding that this signal success clearly proves the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people ready to flatten even thousands of mountains when called for by the party.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be carried out by the complex, noting that the position and role of the complex are very important for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					  When the second-phase project for technological updating of the complex is completed, it will have all processes for turning out varieties of goods with intermediary vinalon produce, making it possible to bring about a signal turn in the chemical industry, he noted.
					
					 He praised the workers of the complex for conducting a bold and big operation for setting up new processes with a loyal determination to glorify the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the vinalon industry, down through generations and showed such profound loving care for them as personally unraveling knotty problems.
					
					 The complex can complete the second-phase project for technological updating in a brief span of time as it has workers intensely loyal to the party and the revolution, the existing solid economic foundation and ranks of able technicians, he said, indicating the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 The second leg of his guidance was the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					
					 Going round a compressor shop, an iron casting shop now under construction and other production processes, he acquainted himself in detail with the production and construction of the complex and warmly encouraged the workers in the dynamic drive to boost production.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction at the fact that the workers of Ryongsong are making continued leap forward, after learning in detail about the mechanism, efficiency and principle of operation of new type compressors and other modern machines standing in rows at large workshops.
					
					 It is the admirable success that the workers of Ryongsong faithful to the idea and leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea overfulfiled their production plan even in the period of the "Arduous March," the forced march, and contrived and manufactured machine products of the latest type by their own efforts and with indigenous technology by giving full play to the revolutionary spirit of fortitude, the do-or-die spirit, he said, highly appreciating their feats and extending greetings to all workers, technicians and officials of the complex.
					
					 We could successfully realize the socialist industrialization in so short span of time and rapidly augment the nation's economic potential thanks to many powerful and large machine-building bases such as the complex demonstrating the might of the independent national economy, he said, adding: We are optimistic about the successful building of a great prosperous and powerful nation as we have such tremendous potential.
					
					 Saying that the complex plays a very important role in opening the gate to a thriving nation, he advanced highly important tasks to be carried out by it.
					
					 Many more machines and custom-built equipment are required by every sector of the national economy than ever before today when the final charge is going on in full gear to build a great prosperous and powerful nation, he noted, urging the workers of Ryongsong to make continued innovation and progress with the same vim and vigor as they displayed to produce large-size machines with nothing after the war, thus startling the world.
					
					 The WPK's expectation for the complex is very great, he said, stressing the need for its workers to devote all their wisdom and zeal to making a great leap forward again in the production of machines, including custom-built equipment necessary for updating the key industries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA at Various Constituencies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Nominated as Candidate for Deputy to 12th SPA at Various Constituencies
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Voters' meetings were held at constituencies organized at units of the Korean People's Army and in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sinuiju, Sariwon, Kanggye, Hamhung, Chollima County of South Phyongan Province, etc. in the wake of the electors' meeting held at Constituency No. 333 on Feb. 1 in which KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il was first nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA.
					 The meetings nominated Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA.
					
					 The reporters at the meetings courteously proposed the nomination of him as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA carrying the unanimous desire and ardent wishes of all the servicepersons and people. The speakers and all other voters expressed full support and approval of it.
					
					 They evinced their resolution to effect a new great revolutionary surge and bring about a great turn in the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, proud of having nominated Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA.
					
					 The meetings solemnly declared that Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th SPA in their constituencies, as unanimously desired by all the voters and absolutely supported and approved by all of them.

articles.title: Korea Gripped with Boundless Emotion and Joy
articles.content:
Korea Gripped with Boundless Emotion and Joy
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that General Secretary Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly at Constituency No. 333, the entire army and people are full of great happiness and pride of having the peerlessly great man as the leader of the nation.
					 Anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Hwang Sun Hui said that the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters were very happy to hear the news. She went on:
					
					A few days ago the officers and men of the People's Army nominated  Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the SPA with boundless reverence. This is the unanimous will and ardent desire of the entire people.
					
					 On receiving this happy news with the February 16, the greatest holiday of the nation, ahead, I can hardly repress the swelling emotion.
					
					 We anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters will uphold the leader's plan of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the van of the people.
					
					Vice-premier of the DPRK Cabinet Thae Jong Su, noting that having nominated Kim Jong Il as a candidate for deputy to the SPA this time again is the unanimous will of the entire army and people and a great auspicious event of the nation, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has been leading the Party and the revolution along one road of victory for scores of years, thus performing great feats which will remain immortal in the history of the country.
					
					He is the peerlessly great man who has defended firmly and developed in depth President
						Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea and line on state building and demonstrated the dignity and might of the DPRK all over the world with his original Songun politics.
					
					 All the officers and men of the People's Army and the people came to have as a firm faith through life that he is the destiny and future of our country and nation and the symbol of all the victories.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik expressed his great excitement as follows:
					
					 Today the DPRK is ushering in a turning-point unprecedented in its development.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has brought about the heyday of the socialist public health in this land where the bright dawn is breaking under the Songun politics. This undying exploit is brilliantly shining along with his idea and theory which have developed in depth the Juche-based public health idea and with his wise leadership and warm love for the development of public health.
					
					 We entire officials of public health fully hail his nomination as a candidate for deputy to the SPA.

articles.title: Chinese Government to Provide Free Aid to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Government to Provide Free Aid to DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The government of the People's Republic of China recently decided to offer free aid to the DPRK.
					 The aid will be an encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle to accelerate the building of a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and U.K. Parliamentary Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and U.K. Parliamentary Delegations
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the British parliamentary delegation at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present there were members of the SPA delegation led by Deputy to the SPA Ri Jong Hyok who is chairman of the DPRK-U.K. Friendship Parliamentary Group from the DPRK side and members of the British parliamentary delegation led by Member of the House of Lords David Alton who is chairman of the British-DPRK All-Party Parliamentary Group and British Ambassador to the DPRK Peter Hughes from the opposite side.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on boosting the friendly relations between the two parliaments and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Equatorial Guinean FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Equatorial Guinean FM
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, sent a message of greetings to Pastor Micha Ondo Bile, minister of Foreign Affairs, International Co-operation and Francophone Affairs, on Jan. 28 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea.
					 The message referred to the fact that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation have consolidated and developed in various fields for the last four decades since the establishment of diplomatic relations.
					
					 Expressing solidarity with the cause of the government and people of Equatorial Guinea for achieving the peace, stability, progress and prosperity of the country, the message wished Pastor Micha Ondo Bile great success in his work.

articles.title: Credentials to President of SPA Presidium
articles.content:
Credentials to President of SPA Presidium
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Blaise Godet, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Katharina Zellweger, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK, and a staff member of the Swiss embassy here.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Swiss Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Swiss Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, met and had a talk with Blaise Godet, new Swiss ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Feb. 4.
					 On hand were officials concerned and the country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK and a staff member of the Swiss embassy.

articles.title: Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Zile Singh hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Feb. 4 on the occasion of the day of the Republic of India.
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea Kim Pyong Phal who is chairman of the DPRK-India Friendship Association, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Jon Yong Jin, Vice-Director General of the Korean Central News Agency Kim Chang Gwang and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations in Pyongyang.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Indian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Adherence to Anti-Imperialist Independent Stand Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Anti-Imperialist Independent Stand Called for
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The people's struggle for achieving independence in the new century is facing a stern trial and great difficulties and peaceful development is being obstructed. This is attributable to the moves of the imperialists and the traitors to the nations, their lackeys, to bring down the anti-imperialist independent governments and set up instead pro-U.S., pro-Western regimes and thus reduce their people to colonial slaves who meekly obey them and realize their unchallenged ambition for domination.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is very important to meet the challenges of the above-mentioned forces in order to achieve the independent development of countries and nations and make the whole world independent.
					
					 The imperialists' maneuvers against independence and peace will go on as long as they exist. That is why the popular masses should carry on the struggle for accomplishing the cause of independence generation after generation.
					
					 Any illusion about the working class enemies in the acute struggle decisive of the fate of the popular masses is as harmful as poison and any concession and compromise lead to capitulation and death.
					
					 As long as imperialism exists, the popular masses' cause of independence and cause of building an independent and peaceful new world can never come true. Therefore, a stubborn struggle should be waged till imperialism has been completely eliminated from the surface of the earth. 
					
					 Those who are acting cat's paws of the imperialists after betraying the country and nation are working class enemies and the target of the merciless working class struggle without exception.
					
					 The working class enemies are most afraid of the unity and make desperate efforts to break it. When the popular masses ensure unity and cohesion, the working class enemies will dare not provoke them.
					
					 These enemies are sharpening their swords to stamp out the popular masses' cause of independence and topple down the progressive governments and social systems, watching for a chance to do so. If they slacken their vigilance against the working class enemies even a moment, they will not be able to dodge the guns leveled at them by the latter. That is why the popular masses should tightly hold their arms either in hard times or in peaceful days.
					
					 It is the truth of history that the anti-imperialist independent forces will win and the hegemonic forces will suffer a defeat in the acute confrontation between them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Dangerous Military Exercise of Japan SDF
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Dangerous Military Exercise of Japan SDF
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The "first airborne unit" of the Ground "Self-Defence Force" of Japan recently staged a parachuting exercise within the framework of a military operation aimed at harassing the rear, supported by helicopter gun ships in a military drill ground in Narashino, Chiba Prefecture, Japan. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The fact that the SDF which claims self-"defence" is its basic mission staged a madcap mobile exercise of its "airborne unit" for the purpose of striking the rear of its "enemy" from the outset of the new year proves that the SDF's basic mission is not defence but a preemptive attack.
					
					 The moves for "coping with contingency" touted by the Japanese reactionaries are nothing but sophism intended to justify their moves to convert Japan into a military giant and launch overseas aggression, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The moves stepped up by the Japanese reactionaries to revise "defense program guidelines" and militarize space, etc. in real earnest from the outset of the year clearly prove the danger of their moves to turn Japan into a military power in order to launch reinvasion.
					
					 It is the invariable wild ambition and strategic goal of the Japanese reactionaries to perpetrate overseas aggression.
					
					 They have become evermore undisguised in their moves to realize overseas expansion and turn Japan into a military giant in order to launch reinvasion. These developments are seriously jeopardizing the peace and security in Northeast Asia, rendering the situation there tense and creating the danger of sparking a new arms race in this region.
					
					 The above-said hysteria of the Japanese reactionaries reminds one of a tiger-moth flying into flames.
					
					 They would be well advised to bear in mind that their reckless moves to convert Japan into a military power and start reinvasion would only lead them to destruction and stop at once their moves for overseas expansion.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Gibberish Assailed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Gibberish Assailed
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago traitor Lee Myung Bak called the president of the Red Cross to a room in "Chongwadae" all of a sudden and unusually raised the issue of "dialogue", urging him to "resume the inter-Korean Red Cross dialogue with initiative."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday describes this as sort of flattery which can be made only by a confrontational maniac.
					
					 The news analyst goes on: Had the Lee Myung Bak group truly thought of the Red Cross work, it would not have stirred up antagonism and distrust between the north and the south, closing the door of inter-Korean dialogue and raising a hue and cry over someone's "human rights" issue and "reform and opening." And it would not have gone the lengths of resorting to such vicious moves for confrontation as instigating riff-raffs under the mask of "non-governmental organization" to scatter leaflets slandering the DPRK.
					
					 Finding itself in an uncontrollable serious ruling crisis as its anachronistic and treacherous confrontational policy has gone totally bankrupt, the Lee group of traitors calculates that its trumpeting about a humanitarian issue would help create impression that it has a will to improve the inter-Korean relations and evade the responsibility for having driven the situation to catastrophe.
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it thinks such poor deceptive artifice will prove workable.
					
					 If the group wants to get rid of the present crisis, it had better stop such a poor farce and roll back at once its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: United Actions of Koreans against Lee Myung Bak Group Called for
articles.content:
United Actions of Koreans against Lee Myung Bak Group Called for
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Whoever truly wants reconciliation and unity of Koreans and national reunification should firmly join the ranks of resolute and merciless actions for thoroughly shattering the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday urges this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The statement made public by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea dealt a heavy blow at the Lee group which has frantically pushed forward the dangerous moves for a war and confrontation with the DPRK while defiling the new era of national history that paved a wide avenue for reconciliation, unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity as a "lost decade" and totally negating the basic ideas and principles for independent reunification, the commentary notes.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that traitor Lee has gone against the desire of the Koreans for reconciliation and reunification since he took office, pursuing his treacherous "policy towards the north." 
					
					 Unity means strength and the key to the victory in the struggle, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 A decisive factor of frustrating the moves of the Lee group of traitors against reunification lies in the unity of the nation and a shortcut to independent reunification, peace and prosperity lies in that all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should get united in the spirit of "By our nation itself."
					
					 If one remains a passive onlooker to the reality today when the group of traitors is working with bloodshot eyes to bring back the June 15 era of reunification for reconciliation and unity which was ushered in by the Koreans at the cost of blood and sweat to the dark age of confrontation and division, this will amount to committing an indelible crime against the times, the nation and history and posterity.
					
					 Only when all pro-reunification patriotic forces in the north and the south and abroad unite as one and take joint actions in the reunification movement, can they successfully meet the blatant challenge of the separatist forces and intensify the movement for independent reunification.

articles.title: Unjust Judgment on Hanchong under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unjust Judgment on Hanchong under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Youth Organizations (Hanchong) released a statement titled "We can never pardon the Lee Myung Bak regime which labeled Hanchong an enemy-benefiting organization" on Jan. 30.
					 Noting that the Supreme Court gave a decision defining Hanchong as an "enemy-benefiting organization" on the same day, the statement charged that the Lee group suddenly brought Hanchong to trial, branding it as an "enemy-benefiting organization" when the candlelight actions against the import of American beef were growing in intensity last year.
					
					 It expressed surging anger at the Lee Myung Bak "government" cruelly trampling down the legitimate and just activities of youths for democratization of society and national reunification.
					
					 Lee will never break the spirit of the young people though he intensifies crackdown by invoking the "National Security Law," the statement said, declaring that all the young people will more vigorously struggle for forcing the Lee regime to step down and bringing about a society free from NSL.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Lauded in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Lauded in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on Jan. 29 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the country's reunification with his outstanding Songun politics, thus performing the undying feats on behalf of the country and the nation.
					
					 Today the DPRK has turned into a political and military power, which firmly defends the sovereignty of the country by its own strength and which no one dare provoke, it said.
					
					It expressed the belief that the WPK and the Korean people under the Songun leadership of
						Kim Jong Il would make a history of new great surge in the efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Statement of KPA General Staff Spokesman Supported
articles.content:
Statement of KPA General Staff Spokesman Supported
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Friendship and solidarity organizations of Ecuador and Germany released statements on Jan. 27 and 28 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification in its statement said that socialist Korea led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the KPA, guardian of the people, would never fall back even a step in the fight against the aggression by the imperialists and their puppets.
					
					 The Juche idea followers and friends of the DPRK in Ecuador reaffirm their solidarity with the Korean people's struggle and scathingly reject the Lee Myung Bak group's confrontational moves, it stated.
					
					 The German branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in its statement bitterly denounced the Lee group for its anti-DPRK confrontational racket. If another Korean war breaks out, the pro-U.S. conservative forces and war maniacs of south Korea will be entirely held accountable for it, the statement warned.
					
					 We will always stand by the side of the Korean people in the struggle to defend socialism and global peace, it declared.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong del distrito de Hamju.
					  Le acompano el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam.
					
					  Primeramente, el Dirigente recorrio el monumento a la direccion sobre el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Tras recordar con profunda emocion la orgullosa trayectoria recorrida por la granja, senalo que gracias a la sabia direccion y el minucioso cuidado del Presidente esta granja que en el pasado se llamaba la tierra esteril y un lugar desfavorable a vivir, se ha convertido en un paraiso de felicidad  en que ondea abundante cosecha.
					
					  Al escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la aldea de granja se entero de los detalles del estado de construccion de esta aldea.
					
					  Viendo las modernas viviendas alineadas al pie del monte Tongbong, la escuela, el jardin infantil, el hospital del pueblo, la casa cultural, la tienda y otras instalaciones de cultura e intendencia levantados arreglada y limpiamente, se mostro  muy satisfecho de que esta aldea se convirtio en una hermosa ciudad rural.
					
					  Al recorrer la tienda de Tongbong situada en el pleno centro de la aldea hizo conocimiento del estado de suministracion de mercancias a los campesinos e ilumino el rumbo y medios para mejorar la labor de suministracion de mercancias en el campo.
					
					 Sostuvo cordial charla con Mun Kum Nyo, benemerita de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) y elogio altamente los esfuerzos de ella quien cumplio  fielmente  con su deber de la jefa de equipo de trabajo durante decenas de anos.
					
					 Enseno que el problema mas importante para abrir las puertas a una gran potencia prospera es aumentar la produccion agricola y presento las tareas que se presentan ante la granja.
					
					  El factor principal de que esta granja podia aumentar bruscamente en los ultimos anos la produccion de productos agricolas reside en que se materializo cabalmente la orientacion de la revolucion de semillas, senalo y destaco que hay que promover continua y energicamente la introduccion de buena variedad conveniente a la clima y el suelo de la granja al poner de manifiesto activo la  facultad creadora de los funcionarios y otros trabajadores agricolas.
					
					  Anadio que en la realidad de nuestro pais en que esta limitada el area cultivable, es importante aumentar decisivamente el rendimiento de la cosecha por hectarea para resolver el problema alimentario y subrayo que para este fin es preciso elevar la fertilidad de tierra y, a la vez, cultivar la tierra conforme a las razones cientifico-tecnicas segun el metodo de cultivo autoctono.
					
					  Asevero que hay que realizar la mecanizacion combinada para resolver satisfactoriamente el problema de mano de obra a medida que se eleva el nivel de intensificacion y cientifizacion de agricultura y tomo una medida de enviar a la granja los medios mecanicos necesarios al respecto.
					
					 El Dirigente senalo que en los ultimos anos en que debian superar grandes dificultades se desplego activamente en todos los lugares del pais la lucha por la construccion rural y, por  resultado, se ha echado la firme base capaz de aumentar de un salto la produccion agricola y destaco que tales exitos vertiginosos sirven de una firme garantia para entrar dignamente en las puertas a la gran potencia prospera al resolver finalmente el problema de agricultura, el de campesinado y el rural de nuestro pais.
					
					  Se promueven energicamente en el campo rural las tres revoluciones ideologica, tecnica y cultural, se fortalecieron el apoyo al campo y la direccion estatal a las granjas cooperativas,  gracias a lo cual se realizaron  con rapidez la claseobrerizacion de los campesinos y la industrializacion de agricultura y la fisonomia del campo se cambia cada dia mas y asi se disminuyo notablemente la diferencia entre la ciudad y el campo, destaco y apunto que esto es la clara manifestacion de la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista presentada por el Presidente y del ventajoso regimen de la economia rural  socialista en nuestro pais.
					
					  La lucha por la construccion rural es la labor sagrada para convertir nuestro rural en el campo socialista rico y civilizado basado en la moderna tecnica, dijo y subrayo que hay que prestar gran atencion al respecto.
					
					  Destaco que el sector agricola es uno de los sectores principales para construir una gran potencia prospera y senalo que todo el pais y todo el pueblo deben producir el viraje trascendental en la produccion agricola concentrando de continuo las fuerzas generales en la agricultura.

articles.title: China decide ofrecer ayuda gratuita a Corea
articles.content:
China  decide ofrecer ayuda gratuita a Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el gobierno de la Republica Popular China decidio ofrecer la ayuda gratuita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Esta oferta del gobierno chino estimulara al pueblo coreano que acelera la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de APS y parlamento britanico
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de APS y parlamento britanico
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre la delegacion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la del Parlamento del Reino Unido de Gran Bretana e Irlanda del Norte.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion presidida por el diputado a la APS, Ri Jong Hyok, presidente del Grupo Parlamentario de Amistad Corea-Gran Bretana, y, por la britanica, los integrantes de la delegacion dirigida por el senador David Alton, presidente del Grupo Parlamentario de Todo el Partido Gran Bretana-RPDC y el embajador britanico acreditado en Corea Peter Hughes.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los dos parlamentos y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Acreditase ante Kim Yong Nam el nuevo embajador suizo
articles.content:
Acreditase ante Kim Yong Nam el nuevo embajador suizo
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ATCC) -- Blaise Godet presento el dia 4 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Confederacion Suiza en Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller coreano Kung Sok Ung, el director de la Oficina Suiza para Desarrollo y Cooperacion en Corea, Katharina Zellweger, y un miembro de la embajada de este pais europeo.
					
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.
